name: NASA
descp: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration is an independent agency of the United States Federal Government responsible for the civilian space program as well as aeronautics and aerospace research.

name: Roscosmos
descp: The Roscosmos State Corporation for Space Activities commonly known as Roscosmos is a state corporation responsible for the wide range and types of space flights and cosmonautics programs for the Russian Federation.

name: ISRO
descp: The Indian Space Research Organisation is the space agency of the Government of India headquartered in the city of Bengaluru.

name: China National Space Administration
descp: China National Space Administration is the national space agency of China.
